page.title: 06Barry Boys Comprehensive
page.content: The emphasis has switced from rural to mainly urban. Only the Brynhill golf course provides any relief from this residential area. it is not a commercial centre it contains the larger part of Barry boys comprehensive school - one of the few single sex comprehensive in the UK. There are 1,750 pupils and about 100 membes of staff at the school. Its motto - 'Goren Golud Coleuder' (Enlightenment is the best wealth) was chosen by the first headmaster when the local Grammar School opened in the 19th C. The school today attempts to enrich the lives of its pupils by installing intellectual curiosity, developing skills and creating a sense of values to fit the modern world.
